Package io.github.abritoh.ruples.mutable

package io.github.abritoh.ruples.mutable
This package contains the mutable Tuple classes, from Tuple1 to Tuple12. These classes represent tuples of varying sizes (1 to 12 elements) and are designed to hold data in a mutable manner, allowing elements to be modified after the tuple is created. Each Tuple can be accessed and modified in a type-safe way, making it suitable for scenarios where the number of elements is known but mutability is required.

The classes in this package are:

  • Tuple1 - A mutable tuple with one element.
  • Tuple2 - A mutable tuple with two elements.
  • Tuple3 - A mutable tuple with three elements.
  • Tuple4 - A mutable tuple with four elements.
  • Tuple5 - A mutable tuple with five elements.
  • Tuple6 - A mutable tuple with six elements.
  • Tuple7 - A mutable tuple with seven elements.
  • Tuple8 - A mutable tuple with eight elements.
  • Tuple9 - A mutable tuple with nine elements.
  • Tuple10 - A mutable tuple with ten elements.
  • Tuple11 - A mutable tuple with eleven elements.
  • Tuple12 - A mutable tuple with twelve elements.
  • KeyValue - A mutable tuple with two elements.

These classes are particularly useful when the elements of the tuple need to be modified after creation, such as in cases where data changes over time or when tuples are used as part of a mutable data structure.

https://github.com/abritoh/ruples

2024-1118
